markdownRemark.html: Only fitting after finishing up Ego is the Enemy by Ryan Holiday, I come across a Youtube video by one of my favorite professional athletes Adrian Ballinger titled Ego vs. Honesty: My Everest Story.

frontmatter.title: Ego vs Honest Ted Talk
